S06bsu051_u:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane' nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārthaṃ trayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ /
S06bsu051_u:6: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
S06bsu051_u:7_0: atha khalu bhagavān śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ
S06bsu051_u:7_1: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdatprajñapta evāsane paryaṅkamābhujya
S06bsu051_u:8: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāman /
S06bsu051_u:9: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirabhivandya bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdan // 1 //
S06bsu051_u:10: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhutistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:11_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06bsu051_u:11_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:13: yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
S06bsu051_u:14: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parīnditāḥ paramayā parīndanayā /
S06bsu051_u:15: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam?
S06bsu051_u:16: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu051_u:22: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06bsu051_u:23: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te - yathā bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyaṃ yathā pratipattavyaṃ yathā cittaṃ pragrahītavyam /
S06bsu051_u:25_1: - yāvantaḥ subhūte sattvāḥ sattvadhātau sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītā aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā
S06bsu051_u:25_2: vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñino vā,
S06bsu051_u:27: te ca mayā sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:28: evamaparimāṇānapi sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu051_u:30: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta, na sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:32: na sa subhūte bodhisattvo vaktavyo yasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06bsu051_u:35: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute na bodhisattvena vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam,
S06bsu051_u:39: evaṃ hi sūbhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet /
S06bsu051_u:42: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇāmudgrahītum /
S06bsu051_u:43: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum?
S06bsu051_u:45: bhagavānāha - evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu adha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu samantāddaśasu dikṣu sukaramākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum?
S06bsu051_u:47: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti,
S06bsu051_u:48: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
S06bsu051_u:49: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet // 4 //
S06bsu051_u:50: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:52: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā sā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat /
S06bsu051_u:53: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat yāvatsubhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanmṛṣā,
S06bsu051_u:54: yāvadalakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanna mṛṣeti hi lakṣaṇālakṣaṇatastathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ // 5 //
S06bsu051_u:56: kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne,
S06bsu051_u:58_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ paścime
S06bsu051_u:58_1: kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne guṇavantaḥ
S06bsu051_u:60: na khalu punaste subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:62: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitā anekabuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:63: ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu ekacittaprasādamapi pratilapsyante /
S06bsu051_u:67: sarve te subhūte aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:69: na hi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmātmasaṃjñā pravartate,
S06bsu051_u:73: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartate /
S06bsu051_u:75: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartate /
S06bsu051_u:77: sacetsubhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06bsu051_u:80: sacedadharmasaṃjñā pravarteta, sa eva teṣāmātmagrāho bhavet, sattvagrāho (Vajr, Vaidya 77)
S06bsu051_u:82: tatkasya hetoḥ? na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharma udgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:83: tasmādiyaṃ tathāgatena saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā - kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyamājānadbhidharmā eva prahātavyāḥ prāgevādharmā iti // 6 //
S06bsu051_u:84: punaraparaṃ bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06bsu051_u:87: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu051_u:88: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirityabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:90: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo 'sau tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā, agrāhyaḥ so 'nabhilapyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:93_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06bsu051_u:93_1: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:94: api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06bsu051_u:96: bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06bsu051_u:98: yo 'sau bhagavan puṇyaskandhastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ, askandhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:100_0: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06bsu051_u:100_1: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:101: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo vistareṇa deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06bsu051_u:104: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06bsu051_u:106: tatkasya hetoḥ? buddhadharmā buddhadharmā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:108: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
S06bsu051_u:110: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:111: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa bhagavan kaṃciddharmamāpannaḥ, tenocyate srotaāpanna iti /
S06bsu051_u:112: na rūpamāpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān dharmānāpannaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:114: sacedbhagavan srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavet - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti,
S06bsu051_u:117: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
S06bsu051_u:119: sa sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā (Vajr, Vaidya 78) sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:120: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa kaściddharmo yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:122: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayānāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
S06bsu051_u:124: na anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:125: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'nāgāmitvamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:127: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu arhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti?
S06bsu051_u:129: nārhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:130: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'rhannāma /
S06bsu051_u:132: sacedbhagavan arhata evaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
S06bsu051_u:135: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:137: na ca me bhagavannevaṃ bhavati - arhannasmyahaṃ vītarāga iti /
S06bsu051_u:138: sacenmama bhagavannevaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
S06bsu051_u:139: na māṃ tathāgato vyākariṣyadaraṇāvihāriṇāmagryaḥ subhūtiḥ kulaputro na kvacidviharati,
S06bsu051_u:141: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhata - samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:143: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ //
S06bsu051_u:144: bhagavānāha - yaḥ kaścitsubhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
S06bsu051_u:146: tatkasya hetoḥ? kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:148: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu051_u:150: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyo yattasyaivaṃ rūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:151: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet?
S06bsu051_u:152: subhūtirāha - mahān sa bhagavān, mahān sugata sa ātmabhāvo bhavet /
S06bsu051_u:153: tatkasya hetoḥ? ātmabhāva ātmabhāva iti bhagavan na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:155: na hi bhagavan sa bhāvo nābhāvaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:157: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāstāvatya eva gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:158: tāsu yā vālukāḥ, api nu tā bahvayo bhaveyuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:159: subhūtirāha - tā eva tāvadbhagavan bahvayo gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu051_u:161: bhagavānāha - (Vajr, Vaidya 79) ārocayāmi te subhūte, prativedayāmi te /
S06bsu051_u:162: yāvatyastāsu gaṅgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyustāvato lokadhātūn kaścideva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnaparipurṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:163: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt?
S06bsu051_u:165: bahu sugata strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam /
S06bsu051_u:166: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā tāvato lokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:167: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06bsu051_u:169: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya bhāṣyeta vā saṃprakāśyeta vā,
S06bsu051_u:171: kaḥ punarvādo ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:173: parameṇa te subhūte āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:174: tasmiṃśca subhūte pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ // 12 //
S06bsu051_u:175: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko nāma ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:177: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - prajñāpāramitā nāmāyaṃ subhūte dharmaparyāyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:180: yaiva subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena bhāṣitā, saiva apāramitā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
S06bsu051_u:182: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:185: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit, tadbahu bhavet?
S06bsu051_u:186: subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata pṛthivīrajo bhavet /
S06bsu051_u:190: yo 'pyasau lokadhātustathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ, adhātuḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:192: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho draṣṭavyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:196: yāni hi tāni bhagavan dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni,
S06bsu051_u:199: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā dine dine gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
S06bsu051_u:201: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhyaparebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06bsu051_u:209: na mayā bhagavan jātvevaṃrūpo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:210: parameṇa te bhagavan āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:211: ye iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:212: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā caiṣā bhagavan bhūtasaṃjñā, saiva abhūtasaṃjñā /
S06bsu051_u:214: na mama bhagavan āścaryaṃ yadahamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavakalpayāmi adhimucye /
S06bsu051_u:215: ye 'pi te bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
S06bsu051_u:216: ye imaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:219: api tu khalu punarbhagavan na teṣāmātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
S06bsu051_u:220: na sattvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
S06bsu051_u:222: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā sā bhagavan ātmasaṃjñā, saivāsaṃjñā /
S06bsu051_u:224: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasaṃjñāpagatā hi buddha bhagavantaḥ //
S06bsu051_u:225: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametat subhūte, evametat /
S06bsu051_u:227: ye iha subhūte sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe notrasiṣyanti na (Vajr, Vaidya 81)
S06bsu051_u:229: tatkasya hetoḥ? paramapāramiteyaṃ subhūte tathāgatena bhāṣitā yadutāpāramitā /
S06bsu051_u:230: yāṃ ca subhūte tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate, tāmaparimāṇā api buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante /
S06bsu051_u:232: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā, saiva apāramitā /
S06bsu051_u:235: nāsīnme tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā sattvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā,
S06bsu051_u:236: nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā vā asaṃjñā vā babhūva /
S06bsu051_u:238: sacenme subhūte tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā abhaviṣyat, vyāpādasaṃjñāpi me tasmin samaye 'bhaviṣyat /
S06bsu051_u:239: sacetsattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā pudgalasaṃjñābhaviṣyat, vyāpādasaṃjñāpi me tasmin samaye 'bhaviṣyat /
S06bsu051_u:241: abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani pañca jātiśatāni yadahaṃ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūvam /
S06bsu051_u:242: tatrāpi me nātmasaṃjñā babhūva, na sattvasaṃjñā, na jīvasaṃjñā, na pudgalasaṃjñā babhūva /
S06bsu051_u:243: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu051_u:250: tasmādeva tathāgato bhāṣate - apratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam /
S06bsu051_u:252: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena evaṃrūpo dānaparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
S06bsu051_u:253: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā caiṣā subhūte sattvasaṃjñā, saiva asaṃjñā /
S06bsu051_u:254: ya evaṃ te sarvasattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāsta eva asattvāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:259: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yastathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito nidhyātaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:261: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo 'ndhakārapraviṣṭo na kiṃcidapi paśyet,
S06bsu051_u:262: evaṃ vastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati /
S06bsu051_u:263: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sūrye 'bhyudgate nānavidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet,
S06bsu051_u:264: evamavastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo 'vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati //
S06bsu051_u:265: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:270: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti // 14 //
S06bsu051_u:271: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā purvāhṇakālasamaye gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
S06bsu051_u:279: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:280: ayaṃ ca subhūte dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣito 'grayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya,
S06bsu051_u:282: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:287: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhenāṃ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:289: sarve te subhūte sattvāḥ samāṃśena bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyanti vacayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
S06bsu051_u:291: na hi śakyaṃ subhūte ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hīnādhimuktiakaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrotum,
S06bsu051_u:293: nābodhisattvapratijñai sattvaiḥ śakyamayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotuṃ vā udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā /
S06bsu051_u:295: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ prakaśayiṣyate,
S06bsu051_u:296: pūjanīyaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya /
S06bsu051_u:299: api tu ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:305: yāni ca teṣāṃ subhūte sattvānāṃ paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṛtānyapāyasaṃvartanīyāni, (Vajr, Vaidya 83)
S06bsu051_u:306: dṛṣṭa eva dharme paribhūtatayā tāni paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṣapayiṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:308_1: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pareṇa paratareṇa caturaśītibuddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan ye mayārāgitāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:310: yacca mayā subhūte te buddhā bhagavanta ārāgitāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:312: yacca paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:314: asya khalu punaḥ subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāntikādasau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu051_u:315: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭimamipi koṭiśatatamīmapi koṭiśatasahasratamīmapi koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi /
S06bsu051_u:316: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniṣadamapi yāvadaupamyamapi na kṣamate //
S06bsu051_u:317: sacetpunaḥ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā ahaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣeyam,
S06bsu051_u:318: yāvatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:321: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:323: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyam,
S06bsu051_u:326: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - sarve sattvā mayā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:327: evaṃ sa sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu051_u:329: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta, na sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:330: jīvasaṃjñā vā yāvatpudgalasaṃjñā vā pravarteta, na sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:331: tatkasya hetoḥ? nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthito nāma //
S06bsu051_u:333: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:334: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu051_u:335: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:337: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:339: na māṃ dīpaṃkarastathāgato vyākariṣyat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
S06bsu051_u:340: yasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:341: tasmādahaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatena vyākṛta - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha /
S06bsu051_u:342: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathāgata iti subhūte bhūtatathatāyā etadadhivacanam /
S06bsu051_u:346: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣa subhūte anutpādo yaḥ paramārthaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:347: yaḥ kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti,
S06bsu051_u:351: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:352: yaśca subhūte tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā tatra na satyaṃ na mṛṣā /
S06bsu051_u:354: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā iti subhūte adharmāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:356: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:357: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yo 'sau bhagavaṃstathāgatena puruṣo bhāṣita upetakāyo mahākāya iti,
S06bsu051_u:361: yo bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmiti, na sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:362: tatkasya hetoḥ? asti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo nāma? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:363: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo (Vajr, Vaidya 85) nāma /
S06bsu051_u:364: bhagavānāha - sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte asattvāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ, tenocyante sattvā iti /
S06bsu051_u:365: tasmāttathāgato bhāṣate - nirātmānaḥ sarvadharmā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpudgalāḥ sarvadharmā iti //
S06bsu051_u:366: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhānniṣpādayiṣyāmīti, sa vitathaṃ vadet /
S06bsu051_u:367: tatkasya hetoḥ? kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:369: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo nirātmāno dharmā nirātmāno dharmā ityadhimucyate,
S06bsu051_u:371: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - saṃvidyate tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:373: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:374: subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan, saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ /
S06bsu051_u:375: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:377: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya dharmacakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:379: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya buddhacakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:381: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:385: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:392: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte teṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:395: cittadhārā cittadhāreti subhūte adhāraiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā, tenocyate cittadhāreti /
S06bsu051_u:396: tatkasya hetoḥ? atītaṃ subhūte cittaṃ nopalabhyate /
S06bsu051_u:399_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06bsu051_u:399_1: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:401: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt?
S06bsu051_u:404: bahu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaḥkhyeyam /
S06bsu051_u:405: tatkasya hetoḥ? puṇyaskandhaḥ puṇyaskandha iti subhūte askandhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:409: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:412: rūpakāyapariniṣpattī rūpakāyapariniṣpattiriti bhagavan apariniṣpattireṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
S06bsu051_u:414: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:418: yaiṣā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā, alakṣaṇasaṃpadeṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
S06bsu051_u:420: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā dharmo deśita iti?
S06bsu051_u:421: subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā dharmo deśita iti /
S06bsu051_u:422: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte evaṃ vadet - tathāgatena dharmo deśita iti, sa vitathaṃ vadet /
S06bsu051_u:425: dharmadeśanā dharmadeśaneti subhūte nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo dharmadeśanā nāmopalabhyate //
S06bsu051_u:426_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavan kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate
S06bsu051_u:426_1: 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
S06bsu051_u:428: bhagavānāha - na te subhūte sattvā nāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:429: tatkasya hetoḥ? sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte sarve te subhūte asattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:431: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:434: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:436: aṇurapi tatra dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu051_u:438: (Vajr, Vaidya 87) api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte samaḥ sa dharmo na tatra kaścidviṣamaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:440: nirātmatvena niḥsattvatvena nirjīvatvena niṣpudgalatvena samā sā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaiḥ kuśalairdharmairabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu051_u:441: tatkasya hetoḥ? kuśalā dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā iti subhūte adharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:443: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhute strī vā puruṣo vā yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravaḥ parvatarājānaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:444: tāvato rāśīn saptānāṃ ratnānāmabhisaṃhṛtya tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:445: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet,
S06bsu051_u:446: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu051_u:448: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā sattvāḥ parimocitā iti?
S06bsu051_u:449: na khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu051_u:450: tatkasya hetoḥ? nāsti subhūte kaścitsattvo yastathāgatena parimocitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:451: yadi punaḥ subhūte kaścitsattvo 'bhaviṣyadyastathāgatena parimocitaḥ syāt,
S06bsu051_u:454: ātmagrāha iti subhūte agrāha eṣa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:456: bālapṛthagjanā iti subhūte ajanā eva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:458: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:459: yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, na lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:460: bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu subhūte, evametatsubhūte, evametadyathā vadasi /
S06bsu051_u:468: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
S06bsu051_u:469: ye māṃ rūpeṇa cādrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa cānvaguḥ /
S06bsu051_u:470: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ // 1 //
S06bsu051_u:471: dharmato buddho draṣṭavyo dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:472: dharmatā ca na vijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum // 2 // 26 //
S06bsu051_u:474: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā?
S06bsu051_u:475: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu051_u:477: na hi subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā syāt /
S06bsu051_u:478: na khalu punaste subhūte kaścidevaṃ vadet - bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñaptaḥ ucchedo veti /
S06bsu051_u:479: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu051_u:481: na bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñapto nocchedaḥ // 27 //
S06bsu051_u:482: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:483: yaśca bodhisattvo nirātmakeṣvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
S06bsu051_u:485: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:486: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - nanu bhagavan bodhisattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:489: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścidevaṃ vadet - tathāgato gacchati vā āgacchati vā tiṣṭhati vā niṣīdati vā,
S06bsu051_u:490: śayyāṃ vā kalpayati, na me subhūte (sa)
S06bsu051_u:492: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathāgata iti subhūte ucyate na kvacidgato na kutaścidāgataḥ /
S06bsu051_u:494: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanti trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajāṃsi,
S06bsu051_u:495: tāvatāṃ lokadhātūnāmevaṃrūpaṃ maṣiṃ kuryāt yāvadevamasaṃkhyeyena vīryeṇa tadyathāpi nāma paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:496: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusaṃcayo bhavet?
S06bsu051_u:500: sacedbhagavan bahuḥ paramāṇusaṃcayo 'bhaviṣyat, na bhagavānavakṣyat - paramāṇusaṃcaya iti /
S06bsu051_u:502: yo 'sau bhagavan paramāṇusaṃcayastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ, asaṃcayaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:504: yaśca tathāgatena bhāṣitastrisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiti, adhātuḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:506: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacedbhagavan lokadhāturabhaviṣyat, sa eva piṇḍagrāho (Vajr, Vaidya 89) 'bhaviṣyat /
S06bsu051_u:507: yaścaiva piṇḍagrāhastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ, agrāhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:513: yo hi kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06bsu051_u:515: api nu sa subhūte samyagvadamāno vadet?
S06bsu051_u:516: subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan, no hīdaṃ sugata, na samyagvadamāno vadet /
S06bsu051_u:517: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā sā bhagavan ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā, adṛṣṭiḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
S06bsu051_u:519: bhagavānāha - evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sarvadharmā jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:522: tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmasaṃjñā dharmasaṃjñeti subhūte asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
S06bsu051_u:524: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:525: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya dhārayeddeśayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt,
S06bsu051_u:530: svapnaṃ ca vidyudabhraṃ ca evaṃ draṣṭavya saṃskṛtam //
S06bsu051_u:533: sthavirasubhūtiste ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti // 32 //
